precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible with the "Start" button in the bottom left corner.
expected_results: No visual changes will occur on the desktop.

precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
The "Start" menu is open and the "Control Panel" option is highlighted.
expected_results: The "Start" menu will close and the "Control Panel" window will open.

precondition: The Control Panel is open in Category View. A link labeled "Switch to Classic View" is visible in the left panel.
action: Click the "Switch to Classic View" link in the left panel.
expected_results: The Control Panel view will change to Classic View.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open and in Classic View.
The 'Wireless Network Setup Wizard' icon is selected in the Control Panel.
expected_results: The keyboard focus will move to the 'Phone and Modem Options' icon.

precondition: The "Control Panel" window is open and the "Add or Remove Programs" icon is highlighted.
action: Type the keys "p" and "o" in sequence.
expected_results: The focus will move to the "Power Options" icon and a tooltip related to power settings will appear.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open.
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor" and "Turn off hard disks" settings will change from "After 20 mins" to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open.
action: Click the dropdown arrow next to "Turn off hard disks".
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear with a list of time interval options.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "System hibernates:" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the "Never" option in the "System hibernates:" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "System hibernates:" setting will be set to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The "Control Panel" window is open and the "Display" icon is visible.

expected_results: The "Screen Saver" settings will be displayed.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu should display "Windows XP" as the currently selected item.
action: Click the dropdown arrow on the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A list of available screensavers will appear, with "Windows XP" still selected.

precondition: The "Screen saver" dropdown menu in the "Display Properties" window is open, showing a list of available screensavers.
action: Click on "3D FlowerBox" in the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Screen saver" dropdown menu will close, and "3D FlowerBox" will be selected as the screensaver.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will close. Any changes made to the display settings will be applied.

precondition: The Control Panel window is open and maximized.
action: Click the minimize button in the top-right corner of the Control Panel window.
expected_results: The Control Panel window will minimize to the taskbar.
